item.title: Node :: Connecting To SQLite Database Using Node.js
item.description: Summary: in this tutorial, you will learn how to connect to an SQLite database from Node.js applications. Installing sqlite3 module To interact with the SQLite database, you need to download and install sqlite3 module. You can use npm to do so using the following command: > npm install sqlite3 After installing the sqlite3 module, you are ready to connect to a SQLite database from a Node.js application. @types도 같이 깔자.
